meanings.sent1: The halver cut the cake in half.
meanings.sent2: I am the halver in our team, always splitting things equally.
meanings.sent3: The halver at the party made sure everyone got an equal share of the snacks.
meanings.sent4: She was like a halver, dividing her time between work and family.
meanings.sent5: The halver in the story ensured fairness and balance for all.

meanings.definition: To divide into two equal parts.
meanings.sent1: Can you halver the pizza so we each get an equal slice?
meanings.sent2: I halvered the sandwich to share it with my friend.
meanings.sent3: He tried to halver the time spent on homework and play.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to halver the town, splitting it in two.
meanings.sent5: She managed to halver the workload by delegating tasks efficiently.
